features: MOISTURIZING+ FORMUA - Formulated with 5 powerful moisturizing, and vitamins-rich agents that dramatically improves your intimate shaving experience; Jojoba Oil / Avocado Oil / Aloe Vera / Shea Butter / Maca Root.

CLINICALLY & REAL-WORLD PROVEN - With the strengths of MOISTURIZING+ agents, COOCHY PLUS Intimate Shave Cream is developed based on the most-trusted intimate shave cream formula. Safe for all skin types. Made in USA.

INTIMATE & UNIVERSAL - Because COOCHY PLUS is formulated for the most intimate areas of the body, it can also be safely used on any other parts of the body. Helps soften even the most coarse body hair, such as pubic hair or underarm hair.

INTIMATE GUARD - To prevent razor bumps, in-grown hairs, razor burn, or rash caused by traditional shaving products, MOITURIZING+ agents softens the hair, and forms an invisible shield on your skin to deliver close shaves that do not leave marks or damage your intimate skin.

PH BALANCED - Ideal vaginal pH level is between 3.5 to 4.5 for your vaginal area. COOCHY PLUS? advanced formula helps maintain that healthy balance to promote freshness and help decrease the chances of vaginal odor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coochy Plus Intimate Shaving Complete Kit - Trusted for 30 years Coochy, a brand synonymous with the best intimate shave cream for over 30 years, is proud to introduce the latest advancement in both shaving and sensual experience. Coochy Plus is the latest iteration in luxury Intimate Shaving Cream that will ensure a superior shaving experience, specifically formulated for women’s most private, sensitive, and intimate areas. Coochy Plus After Shave Protection Moisturizer restores freshly shaved skin, specifically formulated for intimate areas. Use it for post-wax moisturizer. Unlike oil alternatives, the Coochy Plus Protection Moisturizer is never oily or greasy. After the wax, spray the protection moisturizer to calm and rehydrate.

Moisturizing+ - Invisible shield that you can feel Use it every time you shave to leave skin soft, smooth, and moisturized. Coochy Plus works by forming an invisible shield on your skin to aid in a closer shave than ever before. Patent-pending MOISTURIZING+ formula is an intricate balance of 5 powerful moisturizing, and vitamins-rich agents that dramatically improve your intimate shaving experience; Jojoba Oil / Avocado Oil / Aloe Vera / Shea Butter / Maca Root.
BOTANICAL EXTRACTS Experience a decadent, therapeutic after shave moisturizer that revitalizes skin with organic plant extract with scientifically proven hydration retaining properties.

Say Good-Bye to Razor Bump & In-Grown Hair No more ingrown hair, razor bumps, irritation, or itchiness. The patent-pending formula helps to soften even the most coarse body hair, such as pubic hair and underarm hair. Enjoy a closer shave thanks to the protective barrier COOCHY PLUS forms on your skin. This invisible shield ensures skin suffers no marks or damage from the razor.

The Only 1-2-3 intimate shaving system you need Get the complete 1-2-3 intimate shaving experience. Starts with NOURIA Pre-Shave Elixir to condition the skin and hair prior to shaving. Then shave with the most luxurious bump-free intimate shave cream. Finish with Intimate After Shave Protection Moisturizer that delivers hours of hydrating properties long after you shave. With Coochy Plus, intimate shaving is an experience, not a chore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is like liquid gold. I always struggled when it came to shaving my bikini area, razor burn, not a close enough shave and irritation. With this, no longer an issue! It does not lather up like a regular soap or shaving cream but I actually prefer that when shaving the bikini area, that way you can see better. This gives me the closest shave I’ve ever gotten before and if need be you can shave over one spot more than once and still no irritation. I’m also very sensitive to soaps in general so I’ve always had to use the most basic of basic soaps and shaving creams out there which for the most part seem to be garbage. I absolutely love this shave cream! I even use it to shave my legs from time to time and it’s amazing, just depends if you want to use up your product faster. Then I always follow it up with the After Shower Spray which you’ll never guess…. Is Amazing also. I’ve skipped the spray before just to see what the difference would be and it’s not terrible because the shave gel works so well but the spray definitely soothes those sensitive areas and feels nice once you apply it. I also use the spray on my legs after shaving with of without using the shave gel prior and I never have razor burn. Totally recommend these two products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Intimate Shaving kit
reviews.reviewText: I am quite pleased with the shaving creme and the spray. Has helped with after shave itching in bikini area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels soothing and gentle
reviews.reviewText: The shaving cream works great. Extremely gentle and non-irritating on the skin, even down there. The after shave spray also is non-irritating and feels soothing with a light lavender scent. The only thing is I personally didn’t see a difference with ingrown hairs or bumps disappearing or going down after using the spray. It definitely feels nice to use though after shaving 🪒

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I felt smooth and didn’t bump up which is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is no strange smell and leaves your skin soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not EO free
reviews.reviewText: I like the shave cream but the after spray contains essential oils and I assumed it would be EO free since it was for sensitive skin …

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooths the hair
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream smooths my hair before shaving. Adding a lot is a huge difference when shaving. I love it. Plus its fragrance free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not my favorite but...
reviews.reviewText: I do love the shaving cream, and the spray does work. My only complaint is that I prefer the roll on that I used before. The spray seems to drip down my leg and doesn't dry very fast, so I have to walk around naked for a while before putting clothes on. Other than that, very pleased with the results and the price. Also received the products very quickly.
